name: Hot Heat Reset
description:
Hot Heat Reset is a fast-paced maze action game where you play as an unknown speedster hiding under a skull who is in pursuit to recover his stolen lands and is about to deal with a lot of EXPLOSIONS!



Progress through different levels laid across different chapters and unlock new playable characters along the way.





  • Large explorable level layouts
  • Fast paced grid based movement
  • 5 playable characters
  • LOTS OF EXPLOSIONS!
